text: Kin, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a village in Ye Township in Mawlamyine District in the Mon State of south-east Myanmar. It is located on the right bank (northern side) of the Ye River.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, ND 47-02 Ye U.S. Army Map Service, December 1959 ==Notes== ==External links== * "Kin Map — Satellite Images of Kin" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Populated places in Mon State
title: Kin, Ye
